featured.text: The first piece of space junk was created in 1964, when the American satellite Vanguard I stopped operating and lost its connection with the ground center.

definition.zh_def: 先鋒，指在某一領域或運動中走在最前面的人或事物。
definition.en_def: The forefront of an action or movement; a group of people leading the way in new developments or ideas.
definition.example: The company is at the vanguard of technological innovation.
